Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult.”  While there are some interesting visual ideas at work, these twenty minutes aren’t made for a casual viewer.
The silent clip depicts Kenji as discord juxtaposed against weakness, with sequences punctuated by his crying eyeballs and screaming mouths.
